plurals.name: kg_password_default_pin_message
plurals.item: Enter SIM PIN, you have %d remaining attempts.

plurals.name: kg_password_default_puk_message
plurals.item: SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. You have %d remaining attempts before SIM becomes permanently unusable. Contact carrier for details.
